ShortDescription.Value: Zone controller that allows custom changes to zoning any side of a road. Affects which way buildings grow.

Publish.LongDescription:
# ART-Zone --- ART is a mod that provides tools to control roads and the behaviour of zoning grid cells.
## Features Control zoning on roads, with a previewable tool where you can just hover the road and see what you'll get! Right-Click inverts the current zoning configuration
--- ### Supports languages * English, Français (French), Español (Spanish) * 日本語 (Japanese), 한국어 (Korean), 简体中文 (Simplified Chinese), 繁體中文 (Traditional Chinese) * Português (Brasil) (Brazilian Portuguese) * Future updates to add more languages.
## Credits * RiverMochi - mod author * inspired by LuxStice's original Advanced Road Tools * StarQ for technical support. * yenyang for technical support. * and the CS2 modding community for pointers and testing.
